about_the_game:
CHILLS TO THE BONE!

A few months ago, a catastrophic explosion at the Beacon plunged the world into an endless winter. People continue to perish, and the only hope of restoring order lies in repairing the Beacon.

As Victor, an engineer on a mission to save humanity, you’ll journey through a frozen city, scavenging materials for the Beacon and encountering survivors – some bloodthirsty, some benign.

FEATURES:

  • Level-based Structure!

15 immersive levels split between two distinct locations: outdoor levels focused on parkour and indoor areas centered on fight.

  • Numerous Cutscenes and Dialogues!

Immerse yourself in Victor’s dramatic journey through powerful scenes and dialogues that reveal a rich story and universe filled with vibrant characters.

  • Jump and Maneuver!

Platformer controls at their best! Each area is packed with obstacles and deadly foes, keeping you on your toes.

  • Boss Battles!

Every boss victory, requiring refined combat skills, unlocks new abilities, making each step of your adventure even more thrilling.

ARE YOU READY?

Can you bring hope back to a world on the brink of collapse?

name: Hope Inc

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core, x64 architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Hope Inc is a narrative platformer set in a frozen post-apocalyptic world. Explore crumbling buildings, fight against marauders, and unite with those who uphold morality.
